SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="ca9c1bfa5aa144bf95148d251413a5b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]The vision![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It came to me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had a
vision where you were the one who
saved my life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca9c1bfa5aa144bf95148d251413a5b7" Scale="1"/]"[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]The great will of the galaxy[System:Color name="Default"]" is always
right.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You must also pay thanks to the
galaxy for letting it be so.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca9c1bfa5aa144bf95148d251413a5b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]My name is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal22"/]Bernise[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am a teller of
fortunes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] guided by the great will of the
galaxy that led me to this very planet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca9c1bfa5aa144bf95148d251413a5b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]And to you and the countless living things
that exist on this sphere.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Through me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
may all now speak with the great will.
SV021.SV021_Special_Shout:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="f92b3f44d943422285e67deb05cca725" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f92b3f44d943422285e67deb05cca725" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f92b3f44d943422285e67deb05cca725" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"]
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="8e839fe3019f4dbfbeef7adb16511071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e839fe3019f4dbfbeef7adb16511071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e839fe3019f4dbfbeef7adb16511071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e839fe3019f4dbfbeef7adb16511071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Much like the scorching flame of the
Fiery Blowhog,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] today will be blistering,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
boiling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hot.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="de2395c6a5a9419c8234ad39c1d7ad22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de2395c6a5a9419c8234ad39c1d7ad22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de2395c6a5a9419c8234ad39c1d7ad22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de2395c6a5a9419c8234ad39c1d7ad22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Today you must be one with the Bulborb.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Emulate their lackadaisical attitude,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
luck will surely be on your side.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="fceecdab674d4bae8efacd77042ac4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fceecdab674d4bae8efacd77042ac4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fceecdab674d4bae8efacd77042ac4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fceecdab674d4bae8efacd77042ac4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The Breadbug![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It looks like a fine loaf,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
you'll find no yeast within.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The power of
deception can be used to your advantage.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="2a6671a79ecd484288b8b5f14f82202b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a6671a79ecd484288b8b5f14f82202b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a6671a79ecd484288b8b5f14f82202b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2a6671a79ecd484288b8b5f14f82202b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The shine is so bright as it moves along
the earth...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] today will be as radiant
as an Iridescent Flint Beetle!
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="d030dbc3d19e4fceb05d89424b38cfef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d030dbc3d19e4fceb05d89424b38cfef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d030dbc3d19e4fceb05d89424b38cfef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d030dbc3d19e4fceb05d89424b38cfef" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Any chance could be lost in a pinch.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't
jump right in without thinking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be cautious.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Especially around Pearly Clamclamps.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="2dec3021d7a948f095bb06c03d6be305" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2dec3021d7a948f095bb06c03d6be305" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2dec3021d7a948f095bb06c03d6be305" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2dec3021d7a948f095bb06c03d6be305" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I hear a duet of plops and thuds.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your
path today will be peaceful,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like a
Yellow Wollyhop at home in the water.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="de48b3c57ecd44ce95c70bd2d21357da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de48b3c57ecd44ce95c70bd2d21357da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de48b3c57ecd44ce95c70bd2d21357da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="de48b3c57ecd44ce95c70bd2d21357da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Be modest...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]as modest as a Joustmite.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Move with abrupt intention.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It will provide
you with a fresh perspective.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="524928a502d54606b29e5d0e24d7c5e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="524928a502d54606b29e5d0e24d7c5e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="524928a502d54606b29e5d0e24d7c5e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="524928a502d54606b29e5d0e24d7c5e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Waddlepus.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Today your hope will
vanish evanescently into thin air...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]much
like the bubbles the Waddlepus blows.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="cc258a6f41304c158a1b45422bb732a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc258a6f41304c158a1b45422bb732a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc258a6f41304c158a1b45422bb732a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc258a6f41304c158a1b45422bb732a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Today should be spent in a spirit of all-
encompassing love.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Look to the floating
Lesser Spotted Jellyfloat for guidance.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="b92c6c04cc5a437db4603eabd4493306" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The voice of the voiceless grows louder
indeed! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]The truth of the day they bestow
unto thee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let them speak![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b92c6c04cc5a437db4603eabd4493306" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ITZA...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]MYSTA...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b92c6c04cc5a437db4603eabd4493306" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]RIAAA![System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b92c6c04cc5a437db4603eabd4493306" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]It seems the Shockcake has much to
teach you today...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'll find luck if you
can run,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] electrocute,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and slam at will!
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="f56e4e0ae2b44856bb5759d60cc9d175" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You want me to read a dog's fortune?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'll need a canine fortune teller
for that service.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="855280f8438c400489afd0a063de6b09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]There are no stipulations for dogs in the
messages I translate on behalf of the
great will of the galaxy.
SV021.SV021_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal22"/][UE:Meta key="845ab35060c342a18247b72e7a66de67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]Why...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]you...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] To have such an unlucky face![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know I have come upon this visage
in my past...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But where?
